episodes.title: 426 – Melody Post – Cultimatum
episodes.description: The Cultimatum Podcast A deep dive into the dark world of cults, coercive control, and trauma recovery. Hosted by survivor and producer Melody Post, Cultimatum gives voice to those who’ve escaped — and educates those who never saw it coming. Are you serious about deconstruction and asking bigger questions? If that’s the case, this book […]

episodes.title: 303 – NikkiG – Trauma and the Black Community – Deeper Dive
episodes.description: Nikki G. is a Life Coach and Advanced Certified Trauma Recovery Coach (in training) who helps survivors recover and thrive after Narcissistic Abuse, Religious Trauma, Spiritual Abuse, and cult involvement or high-demand groups. Nikki was a part of the Leaning Forward Conference recordings from December 9th, 2023. To access the videos and other helpful reference…Read more →
